problem: 如图,某校园内有一池塘,为得到池塘边的两棵树A,B间的距离,小亮测得了以下数据:∠A=∠CDE,AD=DC,DE=10m,则A,B间的距离是()
answer: 解:∵∠A=∠CDE,∴DE∥AB,∵AD=DC,∴CE=BE,∴DE是△CAB的中位线,∴AB=2DE=20m,答:A,B间的距离是20m,故选:C．
comment: 本题考查了三角形的中位线定理应用,正确理解定理是解题的关键
problem_en: As shown in the figure, there is a pond on a campus. In order to obtain the distance between the two trees A and B by the pond, Xiao Liang measured the following data: ∠A = ∠CDE, AD = DC, DE = N_0, then the distance between A and B is ()
